messages.subject: NEWS ratcheting up a nations fear factor
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/16/03 5:02:18 PM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/16/03 5:02:18 PM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< People who say the 60's never had any effect on our culture are wrong. >>

I think it's hugely affected many people's choice to unschool or to leave
behind institiutional type thought that makes people dependant on "experts".
I think it's affected us in huge ways. Many societal changes hinged on the
actions of the 60's.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
